plugin.name: SpiceBin Plugin
plugin.author: Dan Hoover and Marc J (mjaj72)
plugin.description:
SpiceBin is a Pastebin-style tool for UserSpice that allows public and private pastes as well as special non-public link sharing. Includes code-formatting for 120+ coding languages and 65 code styling themes.
Special thanks to Marc J (mjaj72) for all the work on the initial code formatting.
